entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
